title: Possible Data Corruption Detected
body: I installed the new client patch without a problem and tried to start a game, right when it was about to launch the game it crashes and gives me a bug splat error report. I closed the client and reopened it and was given the possible data corruption detected message and asked if I wanted to repair the files, even after running this the game continues to give me the error and asks to repair the files. Help?

replies.body:
It sounds like your League install is corrupted beyond repair. This is pretty abnormal and may be more prone to happen if you run League on a separate drive than your operating system. To resolve this, I recommend taking a whack at using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs). After installing the app, go ahead and run it and tick the boxes for **Reinstall** and **Clean uninstall**. Hit **Start** and let it rip!

If you still have issues after working through those steps, hit me up.
How many mb do i need to download? after pressing clean uninstall and re-install? I have to know thank you
After it reinstalls the patcher, you'll launch League and begin patching the files for the latest patch as well as reinstalling the rest of the game. A current League install requires about 7 to 9GB.
